task.title: Downloading Clockify App for Mac
task.abstract:
Required Materials
Working Mac laptop/ desktop
OS X 10.12 or later, 64-bit processor
Apple store account

step.cmd: To download the Clockify app on Mac you will need an apple account, if you do not set one up before proceeding.
Search for Clockify in the apple store.
Select the dowload button in the top right corner.
After it is finished downloading, run the application and login or sign up.
You now have access Clockify from your Mac desktop instead of the web browser.
